name: Dongo
description:
Dongo is a third-person role-playing game that I built for block Jam.

In the first scene the player will face the task of defending a at

From a robot army that have been sent by Drago to destroy the earth.

You have to kill them all before the destroy the base or kill you.

You have to guide the base and stay alive.

- Move with (WASD, or arrow keys)

- Rotate with your mouse wheel

- Aim with the right mouse

- Shoot with the left mouse

In the second scene, you have to search through the city to find raw materials for producing biofuel. When you have found up to three you will receive a congratulatory message and you will have to earn your NFT. 

When the player wins the player receives Dongopiks which are Launched on the nervous chain.

It is almost polished, I worked day and night on this game 

I hope you enjoy Dongo
